review: Works great! Very little buffering, if any. Fast and easy to set up! Very happy with the product.
author: Alexander D Rink

review: This is awesome!!!  Great price.  Great options.  Movies. Music. TV Shows!  It has it all!!
author: Luanna

review: Very easy to hook up and navigate through.  Great selection of movies and tv shows!
author: Marty C.

review: This is the best device for getting Netflix and the bonus of all the free games via my Prime account
author: John KC "President CMAPROS"

review: I use it to watch Netflix and listen to Pandora. It works fine for just watching tv.
author: Beeza "vgbaeza"

review: Works perfectly. Easy navigation, attractive user interface, quick streaming. I love it
author: Dante B.

review: I'm usually a big fan of amazon products but this one was a disappointment. The interface was slow and when playing a video on any service it would freeze for a second every 10-15min. I put the roku stick in the same room and it worked flawlessly.
author: aiden45

review: Love that I have everything in one place!
author: Deby Pressnell
